originalText.text: First class and all of the drivers always treat me with respect. Very professional and customer service friendly. 100% recommended

text.text: First class and all of the drivers always treat me with respect. Very professional and customer service friendly. 100% recommended

originalText.text: This is the worst cab service ever provided. Upon booking with them on the app for a set price when I get into the car the driver start complaining about the price how it's not what the app says it's what he says and that he doesn't have to do what the app says. Obviously I was running late so I had to take the cab at the changed rate this man provided upon arrival. But this gets even better upon asking him for his TLC driver license because of his shady way of business he refused to show it me even though by state law you are required to have it on display for everyone to see. When calling the base you get a disgusting man on the phone with does the bare minimum to assist upon calling the base they just kept hanging up. Lastly to make the situation all better the car that I was picked up in wasn't even the vehicle that was on the driver profile when the driver picked up the ride. Below are the two pictures that show his plates along with the fact that nowhere in the car is his TLC license displayed.

If I have to give them less Start I do it.

I spent more than on hour waiting for them to pickup for my appointment.
And I couldn't be on time to My appointment.
